title: Tasmania East Coast Ocean-View Escape Less than Two Hours from Launceston
description:
Inhale the coastal breeze from Scamander Beach Resort, a laidback beachside haven offering ocean views on the picturesque east coast of Tasmania, just two hours from Launceston. The perfect base for a Tasmanian road trip, the resort offers easy access to the popular St Helens and St Marys, Bay of Fires and Freycinet.

Set against a backdrop of wide sandy beaches, crystal-clear waves and lush hinterland, this lovely resort is the perfect place to slow down among natural surrounds. With a swimming pool, playground and ocean-view restaurant onsite, all just steps from the beach, there is really is something for everyone. Stroll to Scamander Beach to swim and surf in the pristine waters or wander the banks of Scamander River and take your pick from myriad fishing spots before whipping up a seafood feast on the public BBQ in the neighbouring reserve - or let the resort do the cooking for you and indulge in home-cooked, Tasmanian-sourced dishes at Beaches Oceanview Eatery, where you can taste a selection of seasonal delights while taking in sweeping vistas.

title: Five-Star Heritage Escape on Tasmania's Derwent River with Daily Breakfast
description: Steeped in over two-centuries of Tasmanian history, immerse yourself in the heritage and luxury of The Woodbridge Tasmania, one of Australia’s oldest historic houses on the water-colour Derwent Riverfront. Superbly restored, this 1825 convict-built Grand Mansion in New Norfolk seamlessly blends rich history and opulent amenities with five-star service to create the ultimate boutique experience only 15 minutes from MONA and a stone's throw from incredible wineries and distilleries. Includes daily continental breakfast, a cheese platter on arrival to share, complimentary two-hour electric bike or jacuzzi and sauna use and guaranteed 12pm late checkout to get the most out of this historic haven. Plus, take advantage of exclusive Luxury Escapes offers and discounts with an included Experience Passport, featuring a 20% discount for the Posh-As Tour with MONA Museum entry and a private tour of Moorila's Estate.

title: Tasmania Beachfront Chalet Stay in the Heart of the Freycinet Coast
description: Indulge in a blissful coastal stay at Swansea Beach Chalets, perfectly positioned along Jubilee Beach on Tasmania's stunning east coast. Nestled between the pristine waters of Great Oyster Bay and the lush Freycinet National Park, these charming chalets are perfect for unwinding. Watch epic sunrises from the beach, visit the local wineries, explore the charming township of Swansea, or take a leisurely drive to the iconic Wineglass Bay. Take scenic beach strolls, go for a swim in the outdoor pool, taste Tasmanian raw honey or feast on fresh seafood at nearby restaurants.

title: Luxe Glamping Adventure Close to Hobart with Nightly Dinners
description: Experience elegant, safari-style glamping right on the banks of Tasmania’s famous River Derwent. The rustic Truffle Lodge seamlessly blends an elegant design with the rugged Australian landscape, creating a romantic outback experience less than an hours’ drive from Hobart and just 40 minutes from MONA. Stay in a massive furnished luxury tent with en suite and enjoy daily breakfast and nightly two-course dinners.

title: Australia’s First Mövenpick Hotel near Hobart Waterfront with Daily Breakfast & Chocolate Hour
description:
Throw open the doors to Hobart with a stay at the newly opened Mövenpick Hotel Hobart - mere moments from the historic waterfront precinct. Proudly claiming the title of Australia’s first Mövenpick hotel, this towering property opened in January 2021 and welcomes travellers from near and far to experience a unique stay with signature Mövenpick touches.

Each of the rooms or suites offers a unique Tasmanian-inspired design that reflects the natural landscape that surrounds the property, with blonde timber accents matched with deep grey textures. Keeping in theme with Tasmania’s reputation as a foodie haven, the onsite Tesoro restaurant offers the finest in modern Italian cuisine as well as locally inspired signature dishes. When you need a change of scenery, step outside the hotel to weave your way through cobblestoned streets and uncover the quaint charms of Tasmania’s capital. Take time to visit the many trendy eateries, renowned museums and galleries, bustling markets and micro-breweries or make your way to the summit of Kunanyi/Mount Wellington where you will find phenomenal vistas.

title: Boutique Escape at Tasmania’s only Small Luxury Hotel of the World
description: Treat yourself to a blissful escape at Woodbridge on the Derwent, a historic boutique hotel - the only in Tasmania to be a part of the exclusive Small Luxury Hotels of the World collection - nestled on the banks of the River Derwent in New Norfolk, near Hobart. Enjoy a daily continental breakfast with coffee, a cheese platter on arrival and more, all included in your escape.

title: Luxe Glamping Adventure Close to Hobart
description: Experience elegant, safari-style glamping right on the banks of Tasmania’s famous River Derwent. The rustic Truffle Lodge seamlessly blends an elegant design with the rugged Australian landscape, creating a romantic outback experience less than an hours’ drive from Hobart and just 40 minutes from MONA. Stay in a massive furnished luxury tent with ensuite and enjoy daily breakfast, nightly multi-course dinners and half day off-road bike hire for two.

title: Explore Tasmania's North with Onsite Dining, Bar & Indoor Pool
description:
Escape to the enchanting charm of this unique hotel boasting self-contained havens in the heart of Launceston. Nestled 10 minutes from the city and a stone's throw away from breathtaking nature like Cataract Gorge and the Tamar Island Wetlands, Country Club Villas blends comfort and convenience with unique Tasmanian beauty.

Step outside to find parking at your door, a playground for little adventurers and a serene BBQ area for memorable evenings. Indulge in dining delights at the onsite restaurant and pizzeria, or dive into relaxation in the indoor pool. Set within 300 acres of parkland, lakes and rolling paddocks, this idyllic retreat offers a perfect escape. Explore nearby bush trails, then hop on a complimentary shuttle to Country Club Resort, which hosts more restaurants and bars.
offer_address: 10 Casino Rise, Prospect Vale, Launceston, Tasmania 7250, Australia
